issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.45:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #005454.
issues.description: <th colspan="3" class="lower-bound">LOWER BOUND</th>

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.45:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #005454.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > table > tbody > tr > td:nth-child(2) > div > div > table > thead > tr:nth-child(2) > th:nth-child(2)

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.96:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #882b07.

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

issues.title: Tables do not use `<caption>` instead of cells with the `[colspan]` attribute to indicate a caption.
issues.description: Screen readers have features to make navigating tables easier. Ensuring that tables use the actual caption element instead of cells with the `[colspan]` attribute may improve the experience for screen reader users. [Learn more about captions](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/table-fake-caption).

	LOWER BOUND	AVERAGE TEMPERA…
node.explanation:
Fix all of the following:
  The first child of the table should be a caption instead of a table cell

automatic.name: Size; Target Size; Element too small

issues.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
issues.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (88.9px by 17px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 19px instead of at least 24px.

automatic.name: Tables; Table Data must have Table Header;

issues.title: `<td>` elements in a large `<table>` do not have table headers.
issues.description: Screen readers have features to make navigating tables easier. Ensuring that `<td>` elements in a large table (3 or more cells in width and height) have an associated table header may improve the experience for screen reader users. [Learn more about table headers](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/td-has-header).
